Dm_RT_0044_03: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Yep! They said I could go up there!
Dm_RT_0044_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I promise I'll get it done. The two of us
are gonna see this through!
Dm_RT_0044_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>I knew it! Something told me you were the
best one for this mission.<sp:0:4:0>Everyone has admired your wind-gust
technique since you first demonstrated it.
Dm_RT_0044_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Understand_00>You may be the only Rito capable of
rising above that cloud to find the truth
among the turbulent skies.<sp:0:4:0>Give it your best shot. I'll be here
watching for your return.
Dm_RT_0044_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sigh_01>If only it were possible to find out what's
inside of this blizzard...<sp:0:4:0>Oh?
Dm_RT_0044_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Thanks! Between Link and me, you won't
be disappointed!
Dm_RT_0044_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:QuestionSurprise_01>Why, if it isn't Tulin! I was too focused on
the cloud to notice you.<sp:0:4:0>But if you've come here, that meansâ€”
Dm_RT_0044_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Understand_00>Just what could be happening above
that thunderhead?<sp:0:4:0>Of us all, you may be the best suited to
find out. I believe in you.
